original_text: and if this is done unintentionally without the community being aware of it, then the whole community is to offer a young bull for a burnt offering as an aroma pleasing to the Lord, along with its prescribed grain offering and drink offering, and a male goat for a sin offering.
korean_text: 회중이 부지중에 범죄하였거든 온 회중은 수송아지 한 마리를 여호와께 향기로운 화제로 드리고 규례대로 소제와 전제를 드리고 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 드릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: and if this is done unintentionally
without the community being aware of it
then the whole community is to offer a young bull
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 온 공동체는 어린 숫소를 바쳐야 합니다

sentences.original_text: for a burnt offering as an aroma pleasing to the Lord
along with its prescribed grain offering and drink offering
and a male goat for a sin offering
